column4: how can i install extra video codecs, for some video files i cannot see?
some of my video files will not play, how do i install codecs for them?
what media player? If you're using totem, either install totem-xine or alot of gstreamer0.10-plugins
it is totem. can you tell me how to install the codecs?

sudo aptitude install gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly mpg321 vorbis-tools gstreamer0.10-ffmpeg gstreamer0.10-gl libxine-main1 libxine-extracodecs gstreamer0.10-plugins-bad gstreamer0.10-plugins-bad-multiverse gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly gstreamer0.10-plugins-ugly-multiverse gstreamer0.10-pitfdll
you'll need the universe and multiverse repositories enabled though.
i don't know what that is.
open a terminal, type in 'sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list' and delete the # signs at the beginning of each line containing 'deb' and an URL.
i already started the install thingy you pasted. can i do that after this stuff installs?
if it's already installing, that's fine, you don't need to do anything else.
so i don't need to sudo nano thing?
no, if it's busy installing the bunch of packages, you don't need to.
because that means the universe and multiverse repositories are already enabled, so you don't need to enable them anymore.
it's still saying it can't play it.
is the command finished? and may I ask, what type of stream is it?
can we go pm if you don't mind?
